scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run copy && parcel build src/action/index.html src/options/index.html src/background/index.ts --dist-dir dist && node ./watch/inject.js build
scripts.watch-baseFile: parcel watch src/action/index.html src/options/index.html src/background/index.ts --dist-dir dist
scripts.watch: npm run clear && npm run copy && concurrently "npm run watch-static" "npm run watch-injectDir" "npm run watch-baseFile"
